function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible spread of the coronavirus through wastewater","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of the virus and risk to public health","Mitigation":"Implement proper wastewater management and treatment procedures, maintain well-managed treatment plants, and design proper plumbing systems","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment plants, sealed bathroom catchments, backflow valves, onsite treatment systems","People":"General public, individuals living in households with poor wastewater management","Owner":"Wastewater management authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of attention to environmental aspects of personal protective equipment disposal","Impact":"Increased risk of environmental contamination and inadequate disposal of virus-contaminated waste","Mitigation":"Improve usage and disposal practices for personal protective equipment, implement organized solid waste management strategies","Technologies":"Improved waste disposal methods, additional segregation boxes for medical or infected waste","People":"General public, waste management workers","Owner":"Public health organizations, waste management authorities"}]}
